string-array.name: Description
string-array.item: Check the latest news this week!
View staff members on your course

string-array.name: Message
string-array.item: SALE! 40% off all hoodies and merch, head to our merchandise store on campus, located in the RUSU building. Hurry, sale ends SOON.
Reminder, Database Penetration Testing Coursework due in 1 week. As you may have seen, coursework is due in 1 weeks time at noon. If you have any questions, feel free to message asap.
The online quiz worth 15% on Operating Systems will be made available on Blackboard on Week 11 at 9am. Make sure you are able to complete this when it opens.
An early Merry Christmas to all students at reading celebrating, whether at home or campus!
